content.en: Cervical cancer algorithms: Algorithms play a crucial role in various aspects of cervical cancer screening, including triage, follow-up, prediction, and primary screening. They are used for HPV testing, cytology triage, risk prediction, and evaluating the performance of different screening algorithms. These algorithms are being evaluated in different countries and settings to determine their effectiveness and potential benefits compared to traditional methods like cytology. The goal is to improve the management of HPV-positive women and enhance the overall effectiveness of cervical cancer screening programs.
content.da: Algoritmer for livmoderhalskræft: Algoritmer spiller en afgørende rolle i forskellige aspekter af screening for livmoderhalskræft, herunder triage, opfølgning, forudsigelse og primær screening. De bruges til HPV-testning, cytologisk triage, risikoforudsigelse og evaluering af ydeevnen af forskellige screeningsalgoritmer. Disse algoritmer bliver evalueret i forskellige lande og miljøer for at bestemme deres effektivitet og potentielle fordele sammenlignet med traditionelle metoder som cytologi. Målet er at forbedre håndteringen af HPV-positive kvinder og øge den samlede effektivitet af programmerne for screening af livmoderhalskræft.
